channel.title: Double Fine Adventures
channel.description:
I don't know how old news this is, but I couldn't find it in here! Tim Shafer (Psychonauts, Grim Fandango, Day of the Tentacle) and Ron Gilbert (Monkey Island) are working on a new adventure game, but can't get a publisher to fund it, so they got the fans to do it instead!
[url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/66710809/double-fine-adventure]Kickstarter project[/url]
Within 8 hours they reached their target, and they're now three times over with a month left! You can still donate of course, and $15 for a pre-order, beta access, video series of them making the game, and private forum access doesn't seem bad to me. I know there are a few Psychonauts fans on these forums so thought some out there might like to know.
